resources.string: The Great Wall Of China is visible from the moon.
The Great Wall Of China is NOT visible from the moon.
President Theodore Roosevelt\'s son was called Jack.
President Theodore Roosevelt\'s son was called KERMIT.
A slug\'s blood is actually green.
All Las Vegas gambling casinos have no clocks.
Indeed, all Las Vegas gambling casinos have no clocks.
UCL is indeed BETTER than KCL.
